name: Grappling Run - Game Made in One Hour
name_original: Grappling Run - Game Made in One Hour
description:
what is the worst game you have ever seen? take that, make it 1000 times worse, and give it image effects, and voila, you have my game. this game was made in only ONE HOUR.

swing across an obstacle course with a grappling gun and collect as many coins as you can. DO NOT TOUCH LAVA. have fun.
